import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { registerClickAway } from '../helpers/click-away' import NavItem from './NavItem' import ProductsPanel from './ProductsPanel' import NavMenu from './NavMenu' export default function NavBar () { const [open, setOpen] = useState() function showMenu(menu) { setTimeout(() => { setOpen(menu) }, 0) } useEffect(() => { if (open) registerClickAway(() => { setOpen(null) }) }, [open]) const communityMenuItems = [ { text: 'Tooling', href: '/docs/tooling', description: 'Explore the tooling our awesome community has created.' }, { text: 'Github', href: 'https://github.com/asyncapi', target: '_blank' }, { text: 'Slack', href: 'https://asyncapi.com/slack-invite', target: '_blank' }, ] return (
showMenu('learning')} hasDropdown /> {open === 'learning' && }
showMenu('tooling')} hasDropdown /> { open === 'tooling' && }
showMenu('community')} hasDropdown /> {open === 'community' && }
{/* */}
